      • addAppointment

        public Appointment addAppointment(PatientFile patient,
                         java.util.Collection<Requirement> res,
                         long duration)
                           throws ImpossibleToScheduleException
        Will add an appointment to the time table in the correct slot.
        Parameters:
        patient - The patient who the appointment is for.
        res - The resource scheduled for the appointment
        duration - The length of the appointment
        Returns:
        The appointment.
        Throws:
        ImpossibleToScheduleException

      • closestRoundHour

        public java.util.Date closestRoundHour(java.util.Date date)
        This function will get the first free slot for an appointment.
        Parameters:
        required - All the resources that should be in the time table (incl new resource)
        duration - Length of the reservation.
        Returns:
        The first free slot for an appointment of duration duration.
        Throws:
        ImpossibleToScheduleException

      • getTimeBuffer

        public long getTimeBuffer()
        Returns:
        The minimum amount of time that needs to be between the admission and execution of an appointment.

      • removeAppointment

        public void removeAppointment(Appointment appointment)
        This method can end an appointment after it has taken place.
        Parameters:
        appointment - The appointment to be ended.
